data.title: Gary Barber
data.meta_description: Learn more about Gary Barber at JewishContributions – The best place for discovering Jewish people’s contributions to Media/Hollywood
data.text: Spyglass Entertainment was founded in 1998. The other cofounder, Roger Birnbaum, is also Jewish. Under Barber’s leadership, MGM financed several successful films, such as the James Bond film Skyfall, The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey, 21 Jump Street, Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters, and more.
